phrases: What is the purpose of your visit?
First, I need to find someone with an ability to search.
I guess I will ask their leader.
It is got to be this one.
What kind of an ability will he have...
If you move, I will burn everything including you.
Why cannot I read his mind?
This really is a useful ability...
Question: How do you look for ability-wielders?
So that guy's sis is finding the ability-wielders for you, huh?
What do you want from me?
You do not have to use it anymore.
You just have to look at the map.
His ability to seek ability-wielders is perfect.
Earlier this morning, the UN announced that the democratic revolutionary army,
an organization based in various parts of Asia, had been subjugated.
The UN Chairman Brian Jackson reported that a young
man suspected to be the ringleader, and that everyone has been apprehended unhurt.
For what is to come, he answered, We will look out for attacks from remaining forces.
There even is a useful ability like this?
I hope there will be a quick, peaceful resolution.
It looks like there are other places that are gathering ability-wielders...
Be careful of the One-Eyed Grim Reaper!
I did not think I would be called that of all people...
I guess I became able to learn what the plundered ability is without knowing it.
Big Brother, I plundered every ability of yet another country.
I took an ability to translate languages, and an ability to be active without sleeping at all.
But, do not overexert yourself too much, Yu.
No... I have to finish off the next country as soon as possible.
It may be rough, but I am counting on you to be done before you lose your ability.
An ability to make illnesses worse...?
The ability-wielders are all clumped up again...
To make children do something like that...
One clump only has one glimmer...
What kind of a facility is this?
Oh, so that is what this means.
They have been infected, but the ability has not broken out yet, so they are carriers.
But, I cannot plunder an ability before it breaks out...
The special abilities are truly a disease.
So, before particles are spread all over Earth again, we need to vaccinate every person in the world.
If it is an illness, I can make it worse, and have the ability break out.
Would not that make plundering possible?
So that new ability-wielders do not show up from countries after I leave them...
I need to plunder from all carriers as well from now on...
Shoot until you are out of ammo!
So there was someone with an ability to heal...
I am glad you got all better.
Even if you were using your ability for good, I have to plunder it from you...
If I put this hand on my right eye right now...
I can regain my stature as wielder of the time-leap ability...
With this, I might be even able to save Kumagami.
I did not plunder abilities for something like that.
I cannot allow for acts that break human reason any longer...
I am going to turn this world into one with zero ability-wielders.
They have announced that they have captured Mayor Muscle of their capital Hassan.
According to government insiders, an attack at the mayor's mansion by the coup d'etat army has started,
So I am going here tomorrow...
Once in a while, even if I have to force myself, I should sleep a little...
and he is said to have been captured at that time.
According to government reports, this attack has killed at least 10 city legislators and injured 20 more.
It is necessary to rest one's body every so often...
The government has announced this morning that the leader of the coup d'etat,
Mofsen bin Yagid, has agreed to unconditional surrender.
The ongoing combat within the capital from last year were by a syndicate that was comprised of primarily children,
but due to a skirmish yesterday instigated by a mysterious individual, it seems they have suffered major damages.
With that, the coup d'etat forces
agreed that the syndicate led by Mofsen will not be further prosecuted...
My memory is starting to muddle...
So I should not sleep after all...
What in the world am I doing here...?
Why am I in a battlefield..?
That I would plunder every last ability in the world, and then return to her...
I am sure she was someone very dear to me...
So someone with the explosion ability will show up there...
Then, you can die off together with our principles!
That ability only gives people misfortune.
A city in the United Kingdom
This is too tough for me...
I do not want to do this...
Who the hell came up with such a huge task, and why did it end up that I had to do it..?
Maybe I will just take over this entire Earth!
That is what I will do!
Why am I regretting kicking this thing...?
Why am I crying because of it..?
I still need to keep doing my best...?
Why will not any of it hit?
That is the One-Eyed Grim Reaper!
There is no way we can win!
You should not pick on the weak!
Do you know who the hell that is?
But you cannot do something like that!
That guy has a huge bounty on his head!
If I nab him, I get a ton of cash!
Then, I guess you will have to see some pain as well.
The ability of the very last ability-wielder... was the power of courage, huh...
But that is merely reckless valor...
You were about to die there.
You are a girl with more than enough courage.
So, you should be on your way.
T-Then, I will go call for help!
I will make sure to come back!
It is all over, so I need to get back...
I accomplished everything... so I need to get back...
I must have made a promise...
Now I can spend the rest of my life fooling around.
Thank you for all the hard work.
Your life is not in danger.
But, you need to quietly rest for a while.
By the way, who are you?
So that is how things roll...
Since you plundered thousands -tens of thousands - of abilities...
It is a blessing that you can even talk.
Even though I do not recognize you at all?
That hurts... a lot more than I expected.
Did I make you sad just now?
Because we were in the same class,
and we lived our high school lives together in the student council.
And before you left, you promised me that we would be lovers.
I cannot remember anything at all.
So you held onto them until the very end.
For me, this was something like a good-luck charm...
This was the one thing I could not part with.
Even though it is so tattered, and half torn...
If you were able to come back like this because of that...
Did I make you sad again?
I do not really get it... but please do not cry.
This was a camcorder that I kept recording things I did not want to record for the longest time.
I will record lots and lots of happy everyday life.
And so, let us leave behind lots and lots of happy memories!
Can Ayu be a part of that as well?
What should I say right now...?
I am looking forward to what is to come.
Everything is going to happen from now on!
From now on, let us fill our lives only with fun things.
